products.title: Splash Mushroom Brown Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. Product id: sdb-pfr0675 fabric colour: mushroom brown material: 100% polyester headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash mushroom brown perfect fit roller blind in brown.

products.title: Splash Beige Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Splash beige is an elegant cream colour which will work well with wooden tones throughout the home. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.
